title: A lokinge glasse for eche estate, wherin to weue the fickle fate
author: Johnson, Thomas, d. 1644.
publisher: by Abel Ieffs, and are to be soulde by William Barley dwelling in gracious strete neare leaden haule,
notes: Verse - "Ye carelesse youthes looke well on me".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
